price: (39) Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.[1602]
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
footnotes: [1602]- Once they have been condemned to the Fire.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
